channel.title: CVE Feed for CData -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for CData -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-31850|2024-08-26T20:14:14.357Z -- cdata -- arc
item.description: A path traversal vulnerability exists in the Java version of CData Arc < 23.4.8839 when running using the embedded Jetty server, which could allow an unauthenticated remote attacker to gain access to sensitive information and perform limited actions.

item.title: CVE-2024-31851|2024-07-31T19:40:45.343Z -- cdata -- sync
item.description: A path traversal vulnerability exists in the Java version of CData Sync < 23.4.8843 when running using the embedded Jetty server, which could allow an unauthenticated remote attacker to gain access to sensitive information and perform limited actions.

item.title: CVE-2024-31849|2024-06-04T17:36:46.476Z -- cdata -- connect
item.description: A path traversal vulnerability exists in the Java version of CData Connect < 23.4.8846 when running using the embedded Jetty server, which could allow an unauthenticated remote attacker to gain complete administrative access to the application.
